Package com.tiggerbiggo.prima.graphics

Contains classes for Gradients and Images

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoubleGradient
    Gradient that works with both X and Y components of a vector
    Gradient
    Stores colors and calculates gradients
    HueCycleGradient  
    SafeImage
    A wrapper for a BufferedImage object, which allows safe calls to get and set color methods.
    SimpleGradient
    Simple gradient for 2 colors
